title: Stricken Dumb (2R80)
text:
Set:	Mines of Moria
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Wraith
Twilight:	2
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Maneuver: Exert The Witch-king to discard a tale or weapon.
Lore:	“He felt his tongue cleave to his mouth and his heart labouring. His sword broke and fell out of his shaking hand.”
Rarity:	R
